name: A.I.ming Range
description:
Story:

The AI at your tech lab has gone haywire! With no other option you equip your backpack full of untested guns and battle your way to turn off the terminals responsible.

Controls: WASDMovementArrow KeysShoot in directionEActivate Terminal Credits :
  • Drill8Bit  - Project Manager, Animator
  • SeeU - Environment Artist
  • Federico Calchera - Character and Weapon Concept Artist
  • maxresdefault - SFX Artist
  • Kazic - Composer
  • bubbykinz - Game Designer
  • Onygox - Lead Developer
  • TheDarkBatman - Developer

Made in less than one week for Brackeys Jam 2021.2 with the theme "Let There Be Chaos"!
